name: Demand Drop - Product Line Phase-Out Impact

cascadeEvents.description: Intel 14th Gen launch causes -65% demand drop for 12th Gen laptops. Immediate order cancellations from major retailers
15 major customers cancel or reduce POs totaling $84.2M. Cancellation penalties of $2.8M incurred
12 distribution centers accumulating excess inventory. Total value $28.45M with inventory turns dropping from 15x to 2.1x
11 manufacturing lines at only 35% utilization. Unit costs increase by 85% due to fixed cost absorption
14 suppliers with take-or-pay contracts. Total penalty exposure $14.22M for minimum purchase commitments
Revenue loss of -$110.76M over 4 months. Working capital tied up: $42.67M in excess inventory

name: Q1 Multi-Event - CNY + Viral Launch + Port Crisis

cascadeEvents.description: 4 simultaneous events across supply and demand. Supply Side: 4 plants (90% down), 3 ports (+10d delay), 4 suppliers (+14d delay). Demand Side: Premium smartphones (+85% surge)

Port congestion delays shipments, supplier CNY delays compound impact. 18 critical components stuck in transit or delayed at origin, 22 active shipments affected. Compounding: Normal 14-day + 10-day port = 24-day total delay

Plants at 10% capacity, but even skeleton crews can't run without components. 16 production lines completely stopped (planned 10% becomes 0%), 8 SKUs with zero output. Can't produce even the 10% planned because components missing

Normal demand would deplete in 20 days, +85% demand depletes in 8 days, zero replenishment. 12 distribution centers, 18 smartphone SKUs approaching stockout. Depletion rate: 1.85x demand Ã— 0.1x supply = 18.5x normal rate

Customers see shortages, place duplicate orders, retailers hoard inventory. E-commerce channels show inflated demand, retail panic orders, gray market activity. Actual demand +85% becomes apparent demand +140% due to panic

892 customer orders unfulfillable, $67M revenue at risk, customer satisfaction crisis. Major retail partners, e-commerce platforms, carrier contracts. Revenue impact 3.2x worse than any single event alone
